title: [Portable] LAN Games Repository 1 0 0 [Final]  public
description:
Note: This is a private Demonoid release. If you do not have access to Demonoid, please use the integrated comment system for support.

[b][Portable] LAN Games Repository 1.0.0 [Final][/b]

	This is a collection of LAN enabled games, exclusively made for Demonoid users, by ShoXell. I or ShoXell have not made any of these releases from scratch. Props go to those who have.

	As mentioned before, all of these games CAN BE played in Multi Player mode over LAN. Some of them ARE NOT playable in Single Player mode. And some of them ARE playable in Multi Player mode over WAN (the internet). Please refer to the table below for a complete listing.
	Technically, if you can play over the LAN, you can play over the WAN. Please refer to ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œHow to Play Red Alert 2 over the Internet.pdfÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ in the ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œCnC RA2+YR  [Portable]ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ archive. You can play the other games the same way.

	If you need help regarding any of the games, please post a reply in theForum[/url] in the following format:
[i]Name of the game:
Your PC Spec: CPU, AGP, RAM, OS
Problem:
[/i]
I'll try my best to help you out.

Useful Links:
ShoXell WorX ||[/url] Support Forum ||[/url]

2.	CnC Generals [Portable]

4.	Counter Strike 1.6 [Portable]

12.	Quake3 [Portable]
13.	StarCraft+BroodWar [Portable]
14.	Unreal Tournament [Portable]
15.	Warcraft III + Frozen Throne [Portable]

[b]10.  NFS Hot Pursuit 2 [Portable][/b]
Ok I lied. It is not portable. But the installation literally takes only seconds. And you can play Online and LAN Multi Player with this, as well as Single Player.
Extract
Run ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œAUTORUN.EXEÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ and install the game using key from ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œEA Games Keygen v190.exeÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ in ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œShoXellÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ folder

Enjoy the game over WAN, LAN, or against AI.
